name: BELFAST LOUGH ONE-DESIGN (CLASS III)

images.alt: Belfast Lough OD (Class III) photo on sailboatdata.com
Belfast Lough OD (Class III) drawing on sailboatdata.com

notes: Just before the end of the 19th century, there were 3 types of boats designated as 'Belfast Lough One Design'. Class I, (9 built), Class II (SEABIRD 9 built) Class III (JEWELL - boats named after precious stones), the smallest with an initial 10 built.
